comments_since_last_sample.body: That job is like picking fly shit out of pepper.
These figures cannot be accurate. The last bag I bought was 5 USD for 200 g, so just $25 per kg.
Green Cardamom (elaichi) really is my favourite of all spices. The aroma is just exquisite.

we do use green cardamom in a lot of moroccan recipes, there are imported from India just like all other spices but they are not as expensive as described in this video 
us people are paying for things more than their real values
